Articles.Content:
I've seen alot of shuttles in the past days, so why not have a large thread for them all?

I do not have a shuttle yet but i'm planning to make one.
I'm actually making a shuttle right now, it's almost done. So stay tuned.

This seems pretty broad. A shuttle.

Shuttle- a public conveyance, as a train, airplane, or bus, that travels back and forth at regular intervals over a particular route

So, this means that a craft that carries Kerbals to your space station is a shuttle

I'll re-post here for some more coverage, why not?

The New Space Shuttle 4.0 Cargo

Javascript is disabled. View full album

http://www./download/t6awt645dlyri9c/Space+Shuttle+4_0+Cargo.craft

The Old Space Shuttle 2.0 (crew only)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

http://www./download/s0fexh2q7bzphio/Space+Shuttle+2_0.craft

MANUAL; A MUST READ!

FLY IT LIKE YOU SAW ON TV/YOUTUBE.

DO NOT TINKER WITH THE DESIGN, YOU WILL MAKE A MESS.

ALWAYS USE SUBASSEMBLY TO PAYLOAD, DO NOT BUILD A PAYLOAD WHICH IS LARGER THAN THE BAY.

PAYLOADS GO IN UPSIDE DOWN ON THE DOCKING PORT JR.

USE THE ACTION GROUPS AND DO NOT BE DISAPPOINTED IF YOU FAIL TO USE THEM!

THERE IS SOME EXTRA FUEL IN THE TANK UNDER THE DOCKING PORT (Shuttle 4.0)/ON THE NOSE(2.0)

ACTION GROUPS:

PRESS 1: TO DETACH THE LIQUID ROCKET BOOSTERS BEFORE THEY OVERPOWER THE SHUTTLE ENGINES

*This is unavoidable, I wish I could fix it

PRESS 2: TO TURN OFF THE SHUTTLE MAIN ENGINES BEFORE ORBITAL MANOEUVRES

*The shuttle main engines are designed to be used only when the external tank is attached, if you use them when you have staged the external tank you will spin in space at high speeds

NOTE: VAB folder, not SPH

I'm still working on the ascent profile, but I guess you could call it a shuttle.

This one also has working doors.

Does it have to launch like the real shuttle, or just be a cargo spaceplane glider?
This is what i mean is a shuttle : A planelike rocketplane thing carried into space by some rockets to transport people to a space station or to deliver payloads.

I'm not sure if this counts, as it doesn't mimic the real shuttle, but here's my experimental shuttle from 0.21/0.22.

one of the first versions of the shuttle

It was meant to be the big brother to the the LCLS.But when tweakables were announced for 0.23, I lost my motivation on the project. It needed a major wing redesign anyway.

The furthest I was able to push it was on a Munar free return trajectory.

Most of my screenshots were too dark so I only have a couple more decent pics.

Engine arrangement

Orbital insertion
Here is my shuttle I made long time ago:

I'm making my own shuttle too, it's the biggest usable shuttle i have seen on the forums. The download link is from a old version but a new one is comming. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62882-Space-Shuttle-%282m-cargo%29

I have several launchers for this,one shuttle,one SSTO,one standard,one self powered.

I only have a pic of the SSTO.
I have this oversized shuttle.
My shuttle just made orbit for the first time!

I am not sure if this thread is limited to stock, but I am going to submit anyway

Behold! The K.S.S Zephyr!

http://imgur.com/a/1RxWu

With this shuttle I decided to flip the normal placement of the engines and have the angled engines on the orange fuel tank. This lets the shuttle fly with more control during re-entry if it has any fuel left. I am also planning on replacing the docking node inside the bay with a hinged one that will allow it to rotate out of the bay and dock to my space station (as soon as damned robotics or a similar mod is updated).

I used the B9 pack to make the shuttle and have Ferram Aerospace and Deadly Re-entry installed. It handles exceptionally well when the bay is empty, but has some trouble with too much mass on board. During re-entry it needs to slow down high up in the atmosphere before becoming descending or else the RCS tanks and the landing gear will burn off.

I think shuttles don't have to be inspired by the actual Space Shuttle but can be small ships used to shuttle Kerbals to orbit and space stations and back again.

I think shuttles don't have to be inspired by the actual Space Shuttle but can be small ships used to shuttle Kerbals to orbit and space stations and back again.

Yeah, i'm thinking the same.

All my shuttles don't look anything like the real one.
I am currently working on my own shuttles inspired by PD's. Sadly he was fired and he stopped playing KSP;.;. But When they are done I will post my shuttles here.

Nope. I geuss i didnt know better than to take a screenshot or save the .craft file before I deleted the savegame. might have to remake it someday.

You know, I did sort of create a shuttle, albeit an SSTO shuttle...

Going the completely opposite direction of what I usually build, I present the "Endeavour" Class Cargo SSTO Spaceplane Mk. V.

Affectionately dubbed "Fat Bertha", she was designed to transfer crew between the space centre and orbiting stations in a single stage, and thanks to her new cargo bay, can carry station parts and payloads up to orbit.

This shot shows it's final orbital delta-v statistics at an 80 km orbit more or less.

If anyone's interested, I'll put up a craft file.
